system.description:
“Sage’s Robe-Cloak.” Long flowing hooded robes that look similar to a raincoat or a poncho, decorated with textiles depicting dragons and skies and seas and leviathans and devil-apes.

Effect: You can Surge twice per Violence.

Path of Concordance Set (1/3): When you spend 2-3 Beats on a single Technique, gain Overwhelming on your next Attack.
